title: 2017 Fed Cup Asia/Oceania Zone Group II – Pool D
text: Pool D of the 2017 Fed Cup Asia/Oceania Group II was one of four <a href="Pool%20%28sport%29">pools</a> in the Asia/Oceania Group II of the <a href="2017%20Fed%20Cup">2017 Fed Cup</a>. Four teams competed in a round robin competition, with the top team and bottom teams proceeding to their respective sections of the <a href="2017%20Fed%20Cup%20Asia/Oceania%20Zone%20Group%20II%20%E2%80%93%20Play-offs">play-offs</a>: the top team played for advancement to <a href="2018%20Fed%20Cup%20Asia/Oceania%20Zone%23Group%20I">Group I</a>.
